website_summaries.verdict: If you frequently play golf in hot, dry conditions and want  lightweight shoes that are easy to wear, this attractive pair is definitely worth considering.
pros: Breathable knit makes them fit like a glove
Ideal for golfing in hot weather
Velcro fasteners are easy to adjust
cons: The downside to the knit material is that these shoes are not water-resistant
They also run small - as much as an entire size

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I was concerned the knit material might be too thin on the sides and where the toe part connects to the bottom, but it's not flimsy. It is supportive and these are very well made. They are easy to slip on and off. The pink color is just like the picture-not too bright. I used Amazon's sizing suggestion and it was spot on. I wear a 9.5 in Nike and I ordered a 10 in these and fit perfectly. I wear these as everyday shoes. Even though these are golf shoes the bottoms are not too "spikey" to wear everyday. I would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Fit is spot on, most comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever purchased!! The fit is great. (I sized up 1/2 size just to be safe) socks or no socks. They don't look like your typical bulky leather golf shoe. You could almost where these as an everyday shoe!
customer_reviews.author: SVJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best golf shoes I've ever worn. They are stylish and very comfortable as well. I like that there are not any laces to tie and I can just tighten the velcro as needed. It's especially handy when I spend time in the sand traps and need to unload some extra weight from my shoes quick. I have these shows in two colors and would buy more if there were available.
customer_reviews.author: CamperMN

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes. Not only are they super cute on, but so comfortable. We walked 18 on my first wear and I didn’t have a single blister nor did my feet hurt one bit. They were airy and provided great traction.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Arizonian

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love them, but the fit is weird..too tight all around and i have slim feet. Disappointed for me, but maybe would be good for someone with super narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: SKP - Georgia

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe I own
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe I own, and I own quite a few pairs of golf shoes. They actually don't make your foot look too big, which for a size 10 is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable golf shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable golf shoes ever. I love them. I don't have to wear socks with them if I don't want to and they stay dry when it's wet out.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Fischer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this style shoe, just in a different color. I had the peachy/orange pair and I love them. Got these to go with different outfits on the course. Lightweight and comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Dina K. Wasmer

customer_reviews.title: 11/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn!! I got them for golfing, but have been wearing them for work (where I do a lot of walking) and other activities. In addition to being comfortable, they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Rikki R.

customer_reviews.title: Must have shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and want every color. They are for golfing but I wear them everyday and to the gym. I initially bought them for a trip for easy on and off through security but wear them all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Mccabe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Finally broke down and bought a pair of golf shoes after golfing in normal tennis shoes for three years. I’ve only worn the shoes ones but I absolutely love them. Work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Love these golf shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are AMAZING!!!! Sooooo comfortable and stylish and sleek. Good traction. Even my boyfriend wants a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Okomo

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy & cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were ranked in the top 5 in two different reviews. They are very comfy, which I have come to expect from Adidas. I also love the Velcro in place of traditional laces. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off
customer_reviews.text: Easy on, easy off. Great color. Super comfortable. Bought a pair for me and a pair for my daughter. She loves that she doesn’t have to worry about tying them up.
customer_reviews.author: Christianna R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shoes, girlfriend will reward you
customer_reviews.text: Bought for girlfriend. She loves them. But how I have to take her golfing with me
customer_reviews.author: Bill myers

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I just love this shoes....these look every pretty and they are so comfortable as well. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mmohanty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfortable Golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: I think I could wear these every day. They are super comfy and have good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: They are the most comfortable and stylish golf shoes. I like the Velcro closure. No need to worry about tying them or making sure they’re tied tight enough. Buy ‘em! You’ll love them.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I typically wear 9-9.5 in athletic shoes and I went with the 9.5 and they’re perfect. I walked 9 holes in them this morning and they were extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great fit and feel on the course
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes ever. My feet stay dry, they are surprisingly stain resistant and are super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey M

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light weight. My feet feel great after 36 holes.
customer_reviews.author: twme

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I thought the shoes would be a bit wider but they're pretty comfy. WAY comfier than the hard-as-a-rock Asics I was wearing prior.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Holmes

customer_reviews.title: great, lightweight, summer golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the new golf shoes; however, I have a feeling that when the weather turns, I may need a warmer option.
customer_reviews.author: SRJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, easy to put on and take off, very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia in Fairfield

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! They are so comfortable and I have had lots of positive comments on how they look, too.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love my New Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put-on with velcro straps and super comfortable. I wear them with thick golf socks and they fit well. I feel stable when I swing the golf club. Great color and print and do not show dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Spagirljudy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good fit, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like the color, ease of Velcro strap closure and brand. Bought for a work shoe on my feet about 12 hours and these shoes feel great after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen R Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage daughter. They were true to size, fit perfectly and look very nice. My daughter is extremely happy with these!!
customer_reviews.author: April P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes and the Velcro fits well. For stars because the texture on the soles wears too quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and the Velcro fits well. For stars because the texture on the soles wears too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: imollyq

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes. Bought two pairs and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: carolaird

customer_reviews.title: Light and cool
customer_reviews.text: These are a great, lightweight alternative to traditional golf shoes. The fabric is soft and the velcro closure makes it easy to take them on and off. I recommend these if you want a comfortable shoe to walk the course.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I even wear without socks. Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.author: Zwillcut

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice shoe. More support than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice shoe. More support than I expected. I feel they run slightly large but with an insole they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love. Fit perfect and super cute. I get so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Elly Haldiman

customer_reviews.title: No tie golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and a good price
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to replace my old golf shoes, they fit amazing and look great as well, I get a ton of complements. I was worried about water but so far I have not had any issues when the course is a little wet.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pullum

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a nice shoe but way to small
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice shoe but way to small. Will be sending back. Don't know if I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually worn them on a course yet, but they seem very comfortable and the 8 1/2 size is spot on!.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice St John

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of this shoe. I love the way it fits, and how comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are so comfortable and fit great. I am so happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected nice and light weight Bought as I am a beginner and just wanted something to get started Serves their purpose!
customer_reviews.author: madison s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are so comfy! I own these in three different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne T.

customer_reviews.title: Great frashion golf show
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fashion golf shoe for women. It's light weight but still has enough support to walk a course
customer_reviews.author: Janet F.

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and light!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are so light! They aren’t waterproof so don’t step in any puddles. I love them so much they are so comfy!! So happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Very comfortable and great for golf! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chyanne Worley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome golf shoes, especially if you have arthritis or pain in your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run/walk shoe not for golf
customer_reviews.text: They are not a good golf shoe, no traction. Wore once wish I could return
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE theses golf shoes! They are crazy comfortable and super cute! I love the elastic band too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I really like the shoe but
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a 9 on in a golf store and they were a bit small. The sales person told me that they ran a bit small. At the time they did not have a 9.5 in stock so I bought the shoe online. It fits just right. I really like the shoe. After wearing these shoes very early in the morning when the dew level was heavy, I would recommend the shoes to only be worn in dry conditions. There is no water proofing even around the edges. My shoes were soaking wet. I would give the shoe three stars for that. Most golf course are wet in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I do not typically like the rigid clog-style nursing shoes so opted for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for nursing in size 7. I do not typically like the rigid clog-style nursing shoes so opted for a more athletic type shoe instead. This shoe is quite comfortable overall, and after a 12-hour shift, I find that by the end of the day, my heels are not nearly as sore as with other shoes I have tried. I thought that by the name, the shoes would offer some heat relief and would be more flexible like other knitted shoes I have tried. However, these shoes are quite hot and rigid! They are easy to put on and look nice, but are just too hot for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

product_meta.title: adidas Women's w Climacool Knit Cblack/D Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Sport inspired to provide style, comfort, and performance both on and off the course.
feature_bullets: Circleknit upper material is specially engineered for golf footwear and features superior breathability and stretch comfort while providing golf specific lateral stability
Cloud foam insole provides ultralight cushioning and comfort
Wider midsole-outsole platform to provide the stability golfers require
Spike less pure motion outsole featuring swing plane traction for enhanced flexibility and grip
Velcro strap for enhanced saddle support and stability
